title: Chance: Enock Kofi Adu plays in defeat against Real Madrid
text:
Sports News | 30 September 2015 23:25 CET Chance: Enock Kofi Adu plays in defeat against Real Madrid - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghana international Enock Kofi Adu reveled in his chance to play Spanish giants Real Madrid in the UEFA Champions League prior to Wednesday night's tie at the Swedbank Stadion. 
The Malmoe FF player could not hide his delight coming face to face with World Player of the Year Cristiano Ronaldo and his team mates and a chance to impress for a role in the senior national team of Ghana. 
Enock Adu Kofi was handed a start in the UEFA Champions League game against Real Madrid on Wednesday night and went on to play in the entire duration of the game. 
The Ghanaian and his team mates however lost their home game Rafa Benitez's side, shipping two goals without reply. 
Cristiano Ronaldo scored his 500 goal of his football career to take Real Madrid into a 1-0 first half break before adding a second on the stroke of the final whistle to give Madrid a 2-0 win over their Swedish adversaries.
